name: Crystal Hunt
description:
I have decided to go forward with development of this game.

You hunt crystal and explore.

Hit ESC to quit at any time.

version 3
---------
Print Screen takes a screen shot and puts it in the folder Crystal Hunt_Data/Screenshots
~ brings up the Developer Prompt.
Movement: ASWD
Shift: Run
Walk: 1
Trot: 2
Run: 3
Interact: E
Secrets:
You can load into what ever seed you enter.
The tardis is not a lie.
Bugs:
All the crystals cannot be picked up for some reason. I will fix this in the next release. I will work on caves too.
